channel.title: LCallDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from LCallDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Longtime Iowa federal judge dies at 78 after more than 26 years on the bench
item.description: Robert Pratt, who served as an Iowa federal judge for more than 26 years, died Wednesday at 78 after suffering cardiac arrest while at a gym.

item.title: Illegal immigrant in Florida charged with arson, felony criminal mischief, sheriff says
item.description: Florida police charged ab illegal immigrant with arson after he allegedly set fires under a mobile home and broke windows at a local business.

item.title: Sanctioned Russian jet touches down in Cuba, echoing secret flights before Maduro's ouster
item.description: Russian cargo plane reportedly lands at Cuban military base amid escalating U.S.-Cuba tensions and Trump's national emergency declaration over Havana.
